Class com.nightfire.unittest.UnitTestBase 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.nightfire.unittest.UnitTestBase
public abstract class UnitTestBase
extends Object
Abstract base class for all unit-testing applications.

testCounter
Current unit test case number.
testNames
Array of strings describing individual unit tests - NOTE: Must be given values by concrete child classes!

UnitTestBase()

assert(boolean, String)
Execute the given assertion, printing its description and a stack trace upon failure (followed by the immediate termination of the application).
getStackTrace(Exception)
Get a stack trace in string form showing the stack calls from given exception
log(String)
Log the given message to the unit-test log.
logTestEnd()
Write successful unit test case message to log.
logTestStart()
Write unit-test case initiation message to log.
main(String[])
Example main() that shows how to execute unit test cases.
redirectLogs(String)
Redirect System.out and System.err messages to the given file.

testNames 
 protected static String testNames[]
Array of strings describing individual unit tests - NOTE: Must be given values by concrete child classes!

testCounter 
 protected static int testCounter
Current unit test case number.

UnitTestBase 
 protected UnitTestBase()

main 
 public static void main(String args[])
Example main() that shows how to execute unit test cases. Should be copied to concrete child class that actually does tests.

Parameters:
args - Array of strings containing any command-line arguments.
logTestStart 
 protected static void logTestStart()
Write unit-test case initiation message to log.

logTestEnd 
 protected static void logTestEnd()
Write successful unit test case message to log.

log 
 protected static void log(String msg)
Log the given message to the unit-test log.

Parameters:
msg - Message to log.
assert 
 protected static void assert(boolean assertion,
                              String assertionDescription)
Execute the given assertion, printing its description and a stack trace upon failure (followed by the immediate termination of the application).

Parameters:
assertion - Boolean expression being asserted as true.
assertionDescription - Text description of assertion.
getStackTrace 
 protected static String getStackTrace(Exception e)
Get a stack trace in string form showing the stack calls from given exception

Parameters:
e - Exception to extract stack trace from.
Returns:
String containing the stack trace.
redirectLogs 
 protected static void redirectLogs(String fileName)
Redirect System.out and System.err messages to the given file.

Parameters:
fileName - Name of the log file.
